mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request(user_id, start_time, end_time, reason, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{reason}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT u.full_name, u.username, lr.* FROM leave_request lr JOIN users u ON lr.user_id = u.id WHERE lr.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY lr.created_at DESC
